data.title: AMB Otto Federico von Feigenblatt, PhD, EdD
data.meta_description: Ambassador Otto F. von Feigenblatt is an academician of the Royal Academy of Doctors of Spain, the Royal Academy of Economics and Financial Sciences of Spain. He was knighted by King Phillip VI of Spain with the Royal Order of Isabella the Catholic for his contributions to the social sciences and to the study of leadership in Spain and in Latin America.  He is currently serving as AMBASSADOR and Deputy Permanent Observer to the United Nations for the OIJ.
data.text:
Ambassador Otto F. von Feigenblatt is an academician of the Royal Academy of Doctors of Spain, the Royal Academy of Economics and Financial Sciences of Spain, and the Royal Spanish Academy of the Sea. He was knighted by King Phillip VI of Spain with the Royal Order of Isabella the Catholic for his contributions to the social sciences and to the study of leadership in Spain and in Latin America. Ambassador von Feigenblatt's research is interdisciplinary and he holds multiple earned doctorates and has received more than ten honorary doctorates for his research and service. His research focuses on the nexus between management and international development with a focus on applied anthropology.He is currently serving as AMBASSADOR and Deputy Permanent Observer to the United Nations for the OIJ. In November 2023 he was appointed adviser for education with ambassatorial rank by the Secretary General of the Andean Parliament.

Office of the Household of His Excellency Ambassador Otto Federico von Feigenblatt

Suite 205, Albany Towers,

235 W. Roosevelt, Albany, GA 31701

​Private Secretary: Mr. Miguel Alava Alcivar

Second Secretary: Mr. Tulio Pizarro

Chamberlain: Dr. Luis Gregorio Holguín Galarón

Secretary for Research: Dr. Oscar Yecid Aparicio Gomez

email: everwisehall@vonfeigenblatt.com

Seat of the House: Everwise Hall, Florida

Arms: Quarterly Or and Azure a Cross flory throughout counterchanged between in the first and fourth quarters an Oak Tree eradicated proper fructed Or and in the second and third quarters a Lion rampant also Or.

Crest: Coronet Or a closed Book erect Azure leaved garnished and perched thereon a Little Owl affronty wings displayed Or. Mantled Azure doubled Or.

Badge: Within a Circlet of Chain Or a stack of three Books Azure leaved garnished and perched thereon a Little Owl Or.

Arms, Crest, and Badge granted by Letters Patent of Garter, Clarenceux and Norroy and Ulster Kings of Arms dated 12 April 2024. College of Arms of His Majesty King Charles III of the United Kingdom.

​

The House received the "Dr. Vicente Rocafuerte" Decoration for Educational Merit of the National Assembly of the Republic of Ecuador on the 30th of July, 2024

Coat of Arms of the Head of the Household in Spain as a Knight of the Royal Order of Isabella the Catholic

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

Affinity: The Household’s affinity includes persons who support its activities. Members of the affinity are members of the extended household and therefore are invited to participate in a wide range of activities organized in several countries. Distinguished retainers are supporters who have distinguished themselves in their fields and who enjoy a close relationship with the head of the house. Other members of the affinity include participants in the Interuniversity Lecture Series, one of the central projects of the Household. The House also sponsors two peer-reviewed academic journals, the Journal of Alternative Perspectives in the Social Sciences and the Journal of Asia Pacific Studies. Both journals are indexed and catalogued by EBSCO.

​Institutions Under the High Patronage of the House:

Liceo Panamericano Samborondón

International Academy of Social Sciences

Interuniversity Lecture Series

Journal of Alternative Perspectives in the Social Sciences

Universidad Central de Colombia

Universidad Autónoma de los Andes (UNIANDES, Ecuador)

Observatorio MAPFRE de Finanzas Sostenibles (Spain)

Instituto de la Experiencia Exponencial (Ecuador)

Ed&TIC Research Center (Colombia)

Revista Internacional de Desarrollo Humano y Sostenibilidad
